title: Large-Scale Interprofessional Learning Design for Developing Clinical Guidelines on Coercive Treatment in Psychiatry

context.prior_knowledge: Core psychiatric theories, clinical practice experience, and multidisciplinary collaboration project experience
context.additional_context: Blended workshops and discussion-based classes for advanced professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields

learning_goals: Design psychiatric coercive treatment guideline development processes through interprofessional team collaboration
Critically evaluate the impact of gender/power dynamics analysis on clinical guidelines
Draft and validate patient-centered guideline prototypes through knowledge integration in multidisciplinary teams
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
